document.full_text: japan will not issue new debt to fund an initial extra budget of more than $35 billion for disaster relief, the asahi newspaper said, in a sign the government is wary of alarming bond investors by adding too much to japan's already huge debt pile.
document.title: japan plans 3 trillion yen extra budget, no debt issue: media
lines_and_colors: japan will not issue new debt to fund an initial extra budget of more than $35 billion for disaster relief, the asahi newspaper said, in a sign the government is wary of alarming bond investors by adding too much to japan's already huge debt pile.
